scripts.build:wasm:toon: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown -p temporal-cortex-toon-wasm --release && wasm-bindgen --target nodejs target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/toon_wasm.wasm --out-dir packages/temporal-cortex-toon-js/wasm/ && for f in packages/temporal-cortex-toon-js/wasm/*.js; do [ -f "$f" ] && mv "$f" "${f%.js}.cjs"; done
scripts.build:wasm:truth: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown -p truth-engine-wasm --release && wasm-bindgen --target nodejs target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/truth_engine_wasm.wasm --out-dir packages/truth-engine-js/wasm/ && for f in packages/truth-engine-js/wasm/*.js; do [ -f "$f" ] && mv "$f" "${f%.js}.cjs"; done
